help-file.title: ARMAGEDDON
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <caster> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Enchantment
"Armageddon" will infuse the Dark Knight's weapon with powerful magic that may flare up during battle, calling down the powers of darkness to smite the enemy in assorted evil ways.
